Reviews.Title: “Good location but no value for money”
Reviews.Author: Chandrasekhar V
Reviews.Content: stayed recently eid holidays 4 8 nov 2011 value money day hot water toilets front desk wouldnt look complained manager refused talk insisted fixed suggested boil water kettle sponge bath else facility kilometre bath soft mini bar stocked 2 water bottles complimentary wifi existent lobby ipad restaurant joke family ate breakfast food satisfactory health club empty hall probably construction pool facilities adjoining property kilometer mattress extra cot provided hard plank wood brochure airport transfer complimentary normally charge dhs 60 free probably measure compensate hot water poor facilities indifferent service staff sour note enjoyable holiday family

Reviews.Title: “Pleasent Stay”
Reviews.Author: HawkDhaka
Reviews.Content: location minute walk khalid bin al waleed metro station burjuman shoping mall road cleaned day staffs cooperative breakfast ok wifi covers hotel free stayed suite spacious lcd tv basic hotel swimming pool stayed hotel night spent entire day visiting ok

Reviews.Title: “Good choice for the price and location!”
Reviews.Author: christian_nilson
Reviews.Content: stayed nights midnovember wife abu dhabi flew dubai stayed weekend found hotel perfectly adequate price including breakfast reasonable simple beds wifi location excellent close metro bur mall sightseeing buses breakfast indian flavour indian bit acquired taste people staff reasonably friendly sorted key card promptly dont carry key card pocket phone chip wiped wont leave car luggage hotel departure hours checkout matter parking hotel underground parking nice bit cramped perfectly adequate reasonably priced hotel

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable for its price and location”
Reviews.Author: janedoodle
Reviews.Content: moved 2 nights 5 nights radisson deira travel plans confirmed earlier radisson terms service location excellent terms proximity metro restaurants burjuman included fast wifi expected breakfast spread selection bread juices hot servings included omelette local dishes brought deposit absence cancellation charges nicely coordinated barely able 21 luggages leave walking space partly due super single sized beds comfortable flat pillow bathroom simply furnished looked clean drew shower curtain hit stench sweat spray hot water shower foam couldnt remove bath towels numerous brown stains additionally fixtures fitted properly water leaked shower pipe wc moved slightly sat found bad fittings infrastructure common throughout hotel door lock looked yanks bad concern inside tv remote control desk lamp electric outlets wall lights worst 40min power outage night 9pm entire hotel power except emergency lights corridors staff move guests updated idea coming fix etc nor apologise offer staff morning comparatively minor inconvenience cab drivers usually mistake london crown 1 2 help exactly look location direct driver stay cheap including taxes breakfast wifi comfortable bed near metro restaurants remember electricity granted bring torch

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - 5/5”
Reviews.Author: kainelsmore
Reviews.Content: stayed london crown 3 nights october 2010 impressed hotel location steps metro station lines completed fantastic quibble couldnt actually hotel metro airport thanks local taxi driver value none am astonished cheap accommodation quality food didnt try food brekkie smelt wandered dome cafe restaurant burjuman brekkie day service staff helpful polite definitely stay dubai

Reviews.Title: “Value for Money, Good Location, Good Food, & Very Good Rates..”
Reviews.Author: Vickks
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel junior suite 3 nites rates location hotel perfect 100m burjuman mall metro station breakfast expected bf cleaning toilets found messed cleaning overall liked hotel food location rates

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for a good price”
Reviews.Author: AlistairF
Reviews.Content: stayed london crown hotel 7 nights dubai conveniently located near burjuman shopping centre metro station easy major highways rent car clean kept wifi available throughout hotel tv channels decent stay hours checkout time staff accommodating didnt housekeeping staff nice picky night staff front desk didnt look happy didnt value customer service wasnt definitely stay hotel
